column4: I feel like I'm getting that all too familiar semi gag reflex cough while looking at this. I miss chasing the dragon on da foil. I used to pick up n then mob over to the taco bell on the way home - order a mini quesadilla and a water cup - hello foil & straw. Park in the lot and go to town... sucking up as much burnt bbq smoke I could.
Those trails are beautiful my friend! Happy nods mine aren't as clear but its still some ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥
I'm used to smoking #3,that looks filthy and if you don't keep it in one blob running on the foil you will frizzle it and waste a lot.
What a waste....shoot dope like a grown up...
